headline: Truist Reiterates Buy Rating on Astronics Corporation (ATRO) Following Q3 Earnings Report
summary: Astronics Corporation (NASDAQ:ATRO) is among the 8 Best Small-Cap Defense Stocks to Buy Right Now. headline: Truist names Pascal Belaud as chief AI & data officer
summary: Truist Financial Corporation (NYSE: TFC) today announced that Pascal Belaud will be the company's chief AI & data officer, starting Nov. 24. Belaud, who joins the company from a long tenure at Microsoft, will be responsible for shaping the strategic vision and execution of Truist's AI, data, and advanced automation strategy across the enterprise. He will report to Truist Chief Information Officer Steve Hagerman.

headline: Truist downgrades GitLab on low visibility and heightened execution risk
summary: Investing.com -- GitLab shares face mounting uncertainty as the company navigates a difficult transition away from its legacy seat-based pricing model, according to Truist, which downgraded the stock to Hold and cut its price target to $44 from $55.

headline: How the Narrative Around Exponent Is Evolving After Recent Analyst Updates
summary: Exponent’s fair value estimate holds steady at $83, while the discount rate has inched higher to approximately 7.18 percent. These recent adjustments reflect a mix of optimism around artificial intelligence-driven growth and caution regarding sector-wide automation risks. Revenue growth forecasts remain unchanged at 7.01 percent. Stay tuned to see how investors and analysts can track evolving factors shaping Exponent’s valuation narrative going forward.
